attributes.action: Move out of No 10 and take his party with him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the British public are now sick and tired of the incompetence of your Government.

You have as a government brought us to our knees - we are struggling to make ends meet and everyday prices increase... You have shown no mercy to anyone - quite happy to carry on taxing us to the hilt in fuel, road duty and personal taxes.

Your government had the opportunity to show that they cared by removing the second homes allowance as well as the daily allowance... You are all grossly overpaid and certainly underworked - we see no evidence of you helping us out of this mire. You are all on the take.

As you are supposed to be working for us, we are now telling you that we have NO CONFIDENCE in you and it is now TIME FOR YOU TO GO!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
